title: Emmerdale spoilers: Two major Dingle secrets are revealed tonight
text:
The Dingle clan have been no strangers to keeping a secret or two over the years in Emmerdale, but two rather large ones are set to be revealed during tonight’s episode, as Mandy (Lisa Riley) answers for her crimes in front of her family when Dingle court is called into session.

Mandy wasted little time in getting her feet under the table upon her return to the village earlier this year. However, it recently came to light that she’d been harbouring a few secrets, so when she discovered the money in Lydia’s (Karen Blick) possession, she wasted little time in coming up with a plan to acquire that cash.

After setting off with Lydia’s fortune in tow, Mandy and Vinny (Bradley Johnson) attempt to evade their family at all costs tonight. However, their attempts to do so prove fruitless, and the pair are later apprehended and dragged back to the village.

In an attempt to get Mandy to open up about why she took the money, Dingle Court is called into to session. At first, she’s not having any of the shenanigans, and proceeds to point out the hypocrisy of the whole situation given what happened with Aaron (Danny Miller).

However, she eventually comes clean and tells the truth — that both she and Vinny were recently running a casino card counting scam in a number of establishments run by Terry.

As Mandy explains her motives, it soon comes to light that Charity (Emma Atkins) knew more about her dodgy dealings than she’s letting on.

And that’s not all, as another secret will also come to light — and it’s one that Vinny worries the Dingle’s might discover.

The question is: what exactly is this secret? And — perhaps more importantly — will the other members of the family find out?

Emmerdale continues Tuesday 29thOctober at 7pm on ITV.
